options:
WGUPS Package Routing Application
Please select an option from the options below:
  distance - Display the total distance to deliver all packages
  package - Display the delivery status for ONE package at a specific time
  all - Display the delivery status for ALL packages at a specific time
  clear - Clear the console
  exit - Exit the application
>
time:
Please enter a time in 24-hour HH:MM:SS format
>
